definition: A season characterized by warm weather, longer daylight hours, and typically associated with outdoor activities, vacations, and relaxation. It is commonly used to refer to the period between spring and autumn, when temperatures are generally higher and nature is in full bloom.

examples.german: Im Sommer gehe ich gerne schwimmen.
examples.english: I enjoy swimming in the summer.

examples.german: Wir machen jedes Jahr im Sommer Urlaub.
examples.english: We go on vacation every summer.
